testsuite.name: com.puce.NakanoStay.services.EmailServiceTest

testcase.name: should send booking completed notification successfully()
should throw exception when cancellation booking has no details()
should handle completed mail sending error()
should send booking last confirmation successfully()
should throw exception when last confirmation booking has no details()
should handle booking with multiple rooms()
should handle last confirmation mail sending error()
should send email to correct recipients()
should throw exception when booking has no details()
should throw exception when completed booking has no details()
should handle cancellation mail sending error()
should throw exception when hotel is null()
should process correct templates for user and hotel()
